Name: Hexaza
Description:
A collection of over 2,000 icons including games, apps, emote, streaming stuff and more !

Icon pack features:
- Simplified search with +100 tags
- Organised by categories
- Blank icons to create your owns
- Constantly evolving

It's a community pack: suggest icons via the form and they will be added in the next updates !
Author: Piotezaza
